覄字的基本解释

覄
fù
古同“覆”。

覄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》芳福切，入屋，敷。］
［《廣韻》扶富切，去宥，奉。］
［《廣韻》敷救切，去宥，敷。］
［《廣韻》匹北切，入德，滂。］
(1)倾出；倒出。
(2)翻倒；翻转。
(3)灭亡；覆灭。
(4)覆盖；遮蔽。
(5)指被掩盖的事物或隐微的义旨。
(6)保护；庇护。
(7)广施；遍及。
(8)伏击；袭击。
(9)埋伏。
(10)指伏兵。
(11)审察；查核。
(12)审理；审问。
(13)反；相反。
(14)回报；答复。
(15)重复。
(16)通“愎”。固执；乖戾。

覄字的康熙字典解释
覄字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
覄字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Faint
fù
Ancient Tong "covered".
Faint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" Fangfu cut, enter the house, apply. ]
["Guangyun" help the rich and cut, go to You, and Bong. ]
["Guang Yun" apply rescue cut, go to you, apply. ]
["Guangyun" The horse is cut north, enters Germany, and peng. ]
(1) Pour out; pour out.
(2) Overturned; flipped over.
(3) Perish; perish.
(4) Covering; sheltering.
(5) Refers to things that are covered up or subtle meanings.
(6) Protection; shelter.
(7) Guang Shi; all over.
(8) Ambush; attack.
(9) Ambush.
(10) Refers to the ambush.
(11) Inspection; verification.
(12) Trial; interrogation.
(13) The opposite; the opposite.
(14) Return; reply.
(15) Repeat.
(16) Through "stunned". Stubborn; surly.
